coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Pre-authorization Required for VVIP & VIP. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Dental implants covered up to dental limit. Frames & contact lenses are covered up to optical limit and without age limit. Cover seasonal Hajj & Flu vaccinations. Cover Epidural injection for delivery. Cover allergic tests if medically indicated. Cover Vitamins and any related medications if medically indicated according to CHI. Ear pricing covered up to 300 SR. Dental scaling covered once a year. Cover Preexisting conditions & chronic illness as per CHI. Daily accommodation and living limit for companion is covered. Transportation of mortal remains to home country in case of death in KSA is covered up to annual limit. Psoriasis treatment covered up to 50,000 SR for all classes. Cover medical devices for Diabetes, High Blood Pressure, Asthma and respiratory diseases. Cover Glucose monitor device for diabetic: Freestyle libre 1&2 if medically indicated and prescribed by the treating doctor. Cover diabetic strips, lancets, needles & Alcohol swabs, if medically indicated and prescribed by the treating doctor. Cover canes, neck cushion, basic wheelchairs and joints stabilizers if medically indicated and prescribed by the treating doctor. Cover life & non-life threatening congenital illness as per CHI. Cover all medical tests and laboratory if prescribed by a treating doctor if medically indicated for covered conditions as per CHI. Diabetes care includes: Comprehensive integrated program for diabetes care, Personalized health care plan, Visits to specialists. Adult vaccinations include: 1. Vaccination against common bacterial and viral infections. 2. According to the Ministry of Health's vaccination schedule. 3. Vaccination against chest infections (pneumonia).

coverage_details.special_instructions: Dental implants covered up to dental limit. Frames & contact lenses are covered up to optical limit and without age limit. Cover seasonal Hajj & Flu vaccinations. Cover Epidural injection for delivery. Cover allergic tests if medically indicated. Cover Vitamins and any related medications if medically indicated according to CHI. Ear pricing covered up to 300 SR. Dental scaling covered once a year. Cover Preexisting conditions & chronic illness as per CHI. Daily accommodation and living limit for companion is covered. Transportation of mortal remains to home country in case of death in KSA is covered up to annual limit. Psoriasis treatment covered up to 50,000 SR for all classes. Cover medical devices for Diabetes, High Blood Pressure, Asthma and respiratory diseases. Cover Glucose monitor device for diabetic: Freestyle libre 1&2 if medically indicated and prescribed by the treating doctor. Cover diabetic strips, lancets, needles & Alcohol swabs, if medically indicated and prescribed by the treating doctor. Cover canes, neck cushion, basic wheelchairs and joints stabilizers if medically indicated and prescribed by the treating doctor. Cover life & non-life threatening congenital illness as per CHI. Cover all medical tests and laboratory if prescribed by a treating doctor if medically indicated for covered conditions as per CHI. Diabetes care includes: Comprehensive integrated program for diabetes care, Personalized health care plan, Visits to specialists - ophthalmology, Kidney, foot, heart, psychiatry and Surgery if medically needed. Adult vaccinations include: 1. Vaccination against common bacterial and viral infections. 2. According to the Ministry of Health's vaccination schedule. 3. Vaccination against chest infections (pneumonia).
